org.apache.flink.compiler

Class DataStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.compiler.DataStatistics
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NonCachingDataStatistics

    public class DataStatistics
extends Object
    The collection of access methods that can be used to retrieve statistical information about the data processed in a job. Currently this method acts as an entry point only for obtaining cached statistics.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataStatistics()
      Creates a new statistics object, with an empty cache.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cacheBaseStatistics(BaseStatistics statistics, String identifyer)
      Caches the given statistics.
      BaseStatistics getBaseStatistics(String inputIdentifier)
      Gets the base statistics for the input identified by the given identifier.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataStatistics

        public DataStatistics()
        Creates a new statistics object, with an empty cache.

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseStatistics

        public BaseStatistics getBaseStatistics(String inputIdentifier)
        Gets the base statistics for the input identified by the given identifier.
        Parameters:
        inputIdentifier - The identifier for the input.
        Returns:
        The statistics that were cached for this input.

      • cacheBaseStatistics

        public void cacheBaseStatistics(BaseStatistics statistics,
                       String identifyer)
        Caches the given statistics. They are later retrievable under the given identifier.
        Parameters:
        statistics - The statistics to cache.
        identifyer - The identifier which may be later used to retrieve the statistics.
